Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown

+67 to maximum Life

a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports melee attack skills, making them repeat three times when used, targeting a random enemy each time. Cannot support Vaal skills, channelling skills or triggered skills.

Supported Skills have 45% more Melee Attack Speed
Supported Skills deal 20% less Attack Damage
Supported Skills deal 5% increased Melee Physical Damage

Second Repeat of Supported Skills deals 44% more Damage
Third Repeat of Supported Skills deals 66% more Damage
